ScheduledStatus.name: ScheduledStatus

properties.description: ID of the scheduled status in the database.
properties.name: id

properties.description: The timestamp for when the status will be posted.
properties.name: scheduled_at
params
properties.description: The parameters that were used when scheduling the status, to be used when the status is posted.
Text to be used as status content.
properties.name: params[text]

properties.description: Poll to be attached to the status.
properties.name: params[poll]
params[poll][options[]]
properties.description: The poll options to be used.
How many seconds the poll should last before closing.
properties.name: params[poll][expires_in]
params[poll][multiple]
properties.description: Whether the poll allows multiple choices.
Whether the poll should hide total votes until after voting has ended.
properties.name: params[poll][hide_totals]
params[media_ids]
properties.description: IDs of the MediaAttachments that will be attached to the status.

properties.name: params[sensitive]
properties.description: Whether the status will be marked as sensitive.
The text of the content warning or summary for the status.
properties.name: params[spoiler_text]
params[visibility]
properties.description: The visibility that the status will have once it is posted.

properties.name: params[in_reply_to_id]
properties.description: ID of the Status that will be replied to.

properties.name: params[language]
properties.description: The language that will be used for the status.
ID of the Application that posted the status.
properties.name: params[application_id]
params[scheduled_at]
properties.description: When the status will be scheduled. This will be null because the status is only scheduled once.
Idempotency key to prevent duplicate statuses.
properties.name: params[idempotency]
params[with_rate_limit]
properties.description: Whether the status should be rate limited <!-- TODO: What does this mean -->.
Media that will be attached when the status is posted.
properties.name: media_attachments

    "language": null,
    "media_ids": null,
    "sensitive": null,
    "visibility": null,
    "idempotency": null,
    "scheduled_at": null,
    "spoiler_text": null,
    "application_id": 3,
    "in_reply_to_id": null,
    "with_rate_limit": false
  },
  "media_attachments": []
}

V1::Instance.name: V1::Instance
V1::Instance.exampleJson:
{
  "uri":"mastodon.social",
  "title":"Mastodon",
  "short_description":"The original server operated by the Mastodon gGmbH non-profit",
  "description":"",
  "email":"staff@mastodon.social",
  "version":"3.5.3",
  "urls":{
    "streaming_api":"wss://mastodon.social"
  },
  "stats":{
    "user_count":812303,
    "status_count":38151616,
    "domain_count":25255
  },
  "thumbnail":"https://files.mastodon.social/site_uploads/files/000/000/001/original/vlcsnap-2018-08-27-16h43m11s127.png",
  "languages":[
    "en"
  ],
  "registrations":false,
  "approval_required":false,
  "invites_enabled":true,
  "configuration":{
    "statuses":{
      "max_characters":500,
      "max_media_attachments":4,
      "characters_reserved_per_url":23
    },
    "media_attachments":{
      "supported_mime_types":[
        "image/jpeg",
        "image/png",
        "image/gif",
        "image/webp",
        "video/webm",
        "video/mp4",
        "video/quicktime",
        "video/ogg",
        "audio/wave",
        "audio/wav",
        "audio/x-wav",
        "audio/x-pn-wave",
        "audio/vnd.wave",
        "audio/ogg",
        "audio/vorbis",
        "audio/mpeg",
        "audio/mp3",
        "audio/webm",
        "audio/flac",
        "audio/aac",
        "audio/m4a",
        "audio/x-m4a",
        "audio/mp4",
        "audio/3gpp",
        "video/x-ms-asf"
      ],
      "image_size_limit":10485760,
      "image_matrix_limit":16777216,
      "video_size_limit":41943040,
      "video_frame_rate_limit":60,
      "video_matrix_limit":2304000
    },
    "polls":{
      "max_options":4,
      "max_characters_per_option":50,
      "min_expiration":300,
      "max_expiration":2629746
    }
  },
  "contact_account":{
    "id":"1",
    "username":"Gargron",
    "acct":"Gargron",
    "display_name":"Eugen",
    "locked":false,
    "bot":false,
    "discoverable":true,
    "group":false,
    "created_at":"2016-03-16T00:00:00.000Z",
    "note":"\u003cp\u003eFounder, CEO and lead developer \u003cspan class=\"h-card\"\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://mastodon.social/@Mastodon\" class=\"u-url mention\"\u003e@\u003cspan\u003eMastodon\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e, Germany.\u003c/p\u003e",
    "url":"https://mastodon.social/@Gargron",
    "avatar":"https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/avatars/000/000/001/original/dc4286ceb8fab734.jpg",
    "avatar_static":"https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/avatars/000/000/001/original/dc4286ceb8fab734.jpg",
    "header":"https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/headers/000/000/001/original/3b91c9965d00888b.jpeg",
    "header_static":"https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/headers/000/000/001/original/3b91c9965d00888b.jpeg",
    "followers_count":118944,
    "following_count":305,
    "statuses_count":72309,
    "last_status_at":"2022-08-24",
    "emojis":[
      
    ],
    "fields":[
      {
        "name":"Patreon",
        "value":"\u003ca href=\"https://www.patreon.com/mastodon\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener noreferrer me\"\u003e\u003cspan class=\"invisible\"\u003ehttps://www.\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan class=\"\"\u003epatreon.com/mastodon\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan class=\"invisible\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/a\u003e",
        "verified_at":null
      }
    ]
  },
  "rules":[
    {
      "id":"1",
      "text":"Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting"
    },
    {
      "id":"2",
      "text":"No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism"
    },
    {
      "id":"3",
      "text":"No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies"
    },
    {
      "id":"4",
      "text":"No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users"
    },
    {
      "id":"5",
      "text":"No content illegal in Germany"
    },
    {
      "id":"7",
      "text":"Do not share intentionally false or misleading information"
    }
  ]
}

{ "id": "48914", "action_taken": false, "action_taken_at": null, "category": "spam", "comment": "Spam account", "forwarded": false, "created_at": "2022-08-25T09:56:16.763Z", "status_ids": [ "108882889550545820" ], "rule_ids": null, "target_account": { "id": "108366849347798387", "username": "Baluke", "acct": "Baluke", "display_name": "Baluke Dental Studios", "locked": false, "bot": false, "discoverable": false, "group": false, "created_at": "2022-05-26T00:00:00.000Z", "note": "

Baluke Dental Studios is a full service dental lab offering fabrication, staining, and digital services. Advanced technologies and a meticulous process ensure reduced chair time, lower costs, and better patient outcomes with beautiful smiles. Talk to a representative today.

https://baluke.com/

", "url": "https://mastodon.social/@Baluke", "avatar": "https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/avatars/108/366/849/347/798/387/original/dbcfe99ed5def0f4.png", "avatar_static": "https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/avatars/108/366/849/347/798/387/original/dbcfe99ed5def0f4.png", "header": "https://static-cdn.mastodon.social/headers/original/missing.png", "header_static": "https://static-cdn.mastodon.social/headers/original/missing.png", "followers_count": 0, "following_count": 0, "statuses_count": 38, "last_status_at": "2022-08-25", "emojis": [], "fields": [] } }

ExtendedDescription.exampleJson:
{ "updated_at":"2022-11-03T04:09:07Z", "content":"

For inquiries not related specifically to the operation of this server, such as press inquiries, please contact press@joinmastodon.org.

Funding

This server is crowdfunded by Patreon donations. For a list of sponsors, see joinmastodon.org.

Reporting and moderation

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behaviour, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment. This is especially important when the content is in a language nobody on the moderation team speaks.

We usually handle reports within 24 hours. Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.

Impressum

Mastodon gGmbH
MÃ¼hlenstraÃŸe 8a
14167 Berlin
Germany

E-Mail-Adresse: hello@joinmastodon.org

Vertretungsberechtigt: Eugen Rochko (GeschÃ¤ftsfÃ¼hrer)

Umsatzsteuer Identifikationsnummer (USt-ID): DE344258260

Handelsregister
GefÃ¼hrt bei: Amtsgericht Charlottenburg
Nummer: HRB 230086 B

" }

{ "id": "8", "content": "

Looks like there was an issue processing audio attachments without embedded art since yesterday due to an experimental new feature. That issue has now been fixed, so you may see older posts with audio from other servers pop up in your feeds now as they are being finally properly processed. Sorry!

", "starts_at": null, "ends_at": null, "all_day": false, "published_at": "2020-07-03T01:27:38.726Z", "updated_at": "2020-07-03T01:27:38.752Z", "read": true, "mentions": [], "statuses": [], "tags": [], "emojis": [], "reactions": [ { "name": "bongoCat", "count": 9, "me": false, "url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/067/715/original/fdba57dff7576d53.png", "static_url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/067/715/static/fdba57dff7576d53.png" }, { "name": "thonking", "count": 1, "me": false, "url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/098/690/original/a8d36edc4a7032e8.png", "static_url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/098/690/static/a8d36edc4a7032e8.png" }, { "name": "AAAAAA", "count": 1, "me": false, "url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/071/387/original/AAAAAA.png", "static_url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/071/387/static/AAAAAA.png" }, { "name": "ðŸ¤”", "count": 1, "me": true } ] }

properties.description: Whether the hashtag has not been disabled from auto-linking.
Whether the hashtag has not been reviewed yet to approve or deny its trending.
properties.name: requires_review

properties.description: The ID of the Web Push subscription in the database.
properties.name: id

properties.description: Where push alerts will be sent to.
properties.name: endpoint
server_key
properties.description: The streaming server's VAPID key.
Which alerts should be delivered to the `endpoint`.
properties.name: alerts

properties.description: Receive a push notification when someone else has mentioned you in a status?
properties.name: alerts[mention]
alerts[status]
properties.description: Receive a push notification when a subscribed account posts a status?

properties.name: alerts[reblog]
properties.description: Receive a push notification when a status you created has been boosted by someone else?

properties.name: alerts[follow]
properties.description: Receive a push notification when someone has followed you?

properties.name: alerts[follow_request]
properties.description: Receive a push notification when someone has requested to followed you?
Receive a push notification when a status you created has been favourited by someone else?
properties.name: alerts[favourite]

properties.description: Receive a push notification when a poll you voted in or created has ended?
properties.name: alerts[poll]

properties.description: Receive a push notification when a status you interacted with has been edited?
properties.name: alerts[update]

properties.description: Receive a push notification when a new user has signed up?
properties.name: alerts[admin.sign_up]
alerts[admin.report]
properties.description: Receive a push notification when a new report has been filed?
The emoji used for the reaction. Either a unicode emoji, or a custom emoji's shortcode.
properties.name: name

properties.description: The total number of users who have added this reaction.
properties.name: count
me
properties.description: If there is a currently authorized user: Have you added this reaction?

properties.name: url
properties.description: If the reaction is a custom emoji: A link to the custom emoji.
If the reaction is a custom emoji: A link to a non-animated version of the custom emoji.
properties.name: static_url

properties.description: The name of the identity provider.
properties.name: provider

properties.description: The account owner's username on the identity provider's service.
properties.name: provider_username

properties.description: When the identity proof was last updated.
properties.name: updated_at
proof_url
properties.description: A link to a statement of identity proof, hosted by the identity provider.

properties.name: profile_url
properties.description: The account owner's profile URL on the identity provider.
ID of the status in the database.
properties.name: id

properties.description: The plain text used to compose the status.
properties.name: text
spoiler_text
properties.description: The plain text used to compose the status's subject or content warning.

StatusSource.name: StatusSource

properties.description: The id of the notification in the database.
properties.name: id

properties.description: The type of event that resulted in the notification.
properties.name: type
created_at
properties.description: The timestamp of the notification.

properties.name: account
properties.description: The account that performed the action that generated the notification.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Status that was the object of the notification. Attached when `type` of the notification is `favourite`, `reblog`, `status`, `mention`, `poll`, or `update`.

properties.name: report
properties.description: Report that was the object of the notification. Attached when `type` of the notification is `admin.report`.

properties.name: history
properties.description: Usage statistics for given days (typically the past week).
UNIX timestamp on midnight of the given day.
properties.name: history[][day]

properties.description: The counted accounts using the link within that day.
properties.name: history[][accounts]

properties.description: The counted statuses using the link within that day.
properties.name: history[][uses]

Trends::Link.name: Trends::Link

properties.description: The domain which is blocked. This may be obfuscated or partially censored.
properties.name: domain
digest
properties.description: The SHA256 hash digest of the domain string.

properties.name: severity
properties.description: The level to which the domain is blocked.
An optional reason for the domain block.
properties.name: comment
id
properties.description: The ID of the attachment in the database.
The type of the attachment.
properties.name: type

properties.description: The location of the original full-size attachment.
properties.name: url

properties.description: The location of a scaled-down preview of the attachment.
properties.name: preview_url

properties.description: The location of the full-size original attachment on the remote website.
properties.name: remote_url
meta
properties.description: Metadata returned by Paperclip.
Alternate text that describes what is in the media attachment, to be used for the visually impaired or when media attachments do not load.
properties.name: description

properties.description: A hash computed by [the BlurHash algorithm](https://github.com/woltapp/blurhash), for generating colorful preview thumbnails when media has not been downloaded yet.
properties.name: blurhash
text_url
properties.description: A shorter URL for the attachment.
An OAuth token to be used for authorization.
properties.name: access_token
token_type
properties.description: The OAuth token type. Mastodon uses `Bearer` tokens.

properties.name: scope
properties.description: The OAuth scopes granted by this token, space-separated.
When the token was generated.
properties.name: created_at
